alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 5:23AM EST until February 19 at 8:18PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Buffalo NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Oatka Creek At Garbutt affecting Monroe and Genesee Counties. For the Oatka Creek...including Garbutt...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oatka Creek At Garbutt. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flood stage, general flooding of agricultural land begins, some basement flooding in Scottsville and Garbutt. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 6.1 feet around midday. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 03/19/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM EST.
